class.name: Navigation2D
class.description: Navigation2D provides navigation and pathfinding within a 2D area, specified as a collection of [NavigationPolygon] resources. By default, these are automatically collected from child [NavigationPolygonInstance] nodes, but they can also be added on the fly with [method navpoly_add].

method.name: get_closest_point
method.description: Returns the navigation point closest to the point given. Points are in local coordinate space.

method.name: get_closest_point_owner
method.description: Returns the owner of the [NavigationPolygon] which contains the navigation point closest to the point given. This is usually a [NavigationPolygonInstance]. For polygons added via [method navpoly_add], returns the owner that was given (or [code]null[/code] if the [code]owner[/code] parameter was omitted).

method.name: get_simple_path
method.description: Returns the path between two given points. Points are in local coordinate space. If [code]optimize[/code] is [code]true[/code] (the default), the path is smoothed by merging path segments where possible.

method.name: get_closest_point
method.description: Returns the point closest to the provided [code]point[/code] on the navigation mesh surface.

method.name: get_closest_point_owner
method.description: Returns the owner region RID for the point returned by [method get_closest_point].
